fullplot: To ease their roommate through a relationship-induced depression, Christina Walters and Courtney Rockcliffe take her out on the town. During their attempts to find her "Mr. Right Now", Christina meets Peter Donahue. Missing her opportunity with him that night, Christina is talked into pursuing him to his brother's wedding.
plot: A girl finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right.
title: The Sweetest Thing

tomatoes.consensus: A collection of hit-or-miss gags tied together by a thin plot.
